text:
lassical Childhood Hodgkin Lymphoma
													                    Treatment of high-risk classical childhood Hodgkin lymphoma may include the following:         - Higher dose combination chemotherapy.    -  Radiation therapy may also be given to the areas with cancer.    - A clinical trial of targeted therapy and combination chemotherapy. Radiation therapy may also be given to the areas with cancer.         Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients
